title: PVP.Net PAtcher Kernel has stopped working
body:
So, played fine yesterday (saturday the 4th). did not install anything new on my computer. Today, Sunday the 5th, I get the above error when I try to boot up the game "Pvp.net patcher kernel has stopped working" and then windows checks for a solution, fails, and closes the launcher.

I tried:
1. forcing a repatch per the instructions in the stickied thread in this forum.
no go, same error afterward.

2. uninstalling and re-installing
no go, same error afterward

3. uninstalling, cleaning registry, re-installing
no go, same error afterward

4. updating all drivers, adobe, java, and other secondary software; uninstalling, re-installing
no go, same error afterward

Any ideas for what I might have missed that could help?

Lenovo Y50-70 Touch laptop
Windows 8.1
Intel i7-4700HQ
16 GB ram
64-bit os
Nvidia GeForce GTX 860m

replies.body:
Update: Customer support sorted me out. The solution is to right click on the launcher icon and set it to run in Administrator mode. In Windows 8.1 there were two screens I had to edit.

Adding the solution in case some future person has the same issue.
